name: Escape Amnesia
description:
The player has amnesia from a mysterious freak accident and wakes up in a strange laboratory. The typing tutorials are supposed to help recover his memories, but they take strange twists and turns as he goes along.

To enable typing, aim the green dot reticle at the panel and click with the left mouse button.

Player Movement = W,A,S,D

W = Forward

S = Backward

A = Move Left

D = Move Right

Mouse Movement = Aim

Mouse Left Button = Enable Typing

Created by:

Aaron Daly (https://katuta.itch.io) - Programmer, Tech Artist

Manuel Cabacungan (https://mannycjr.itch.io) - Tech Artist

Fred Ascher - Voice Over
